item.title: Experienced Professional Video Editor & Thumbnail designer - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced Video Editor Required

We need an experienced video editor to copy 3 CD's that we have and make a contents file and allow any of the 8 separate videos to play.
To also include a nice thumbnail for each individual video.
All to be put onto a USB Pen Drive.

ABOUT YOU:
A proven track record of creating great thumbnails
The technical experience to ensure the files are easily playable on both PC/Mac
A solution to provide a "menu" that allows for ANY of the 8 files to play in any order chosen.

Please provide an example of a thumbnail that you have made previously with "Thumbnail Example" so we now that you have read the job description before applying.

Happy Bidding

Budget: $40
Posted On: July 01, 2024 04:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing Software
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing Software
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Seeking West Coast based editor for remote editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor who can take a project from start to finish over a direct remote direction via Splashtop.  This job will be a mix of assistant editing and end-to-end editing.

You must have a solid internet connection (preferably wired ethernet) in order to connect easily.

Experience with RED footage, color grading, project assembly, and project organization are all big plusses.

This job could range from assistant editing, setting up projects + syncing, assembly, and end-to-end editing.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 03:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Academy Announcement Video - Upwork
item.description:
I'm announcing the launch of my paid community, Engagement Academy. I want to evoke emotion, no video footage, just animated words timed to music which I have outlined in this script:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_RUBbVH3y2m2Pik-nZ7-qvUDq4uqwnxVdw4iWRl9rl8/edit?usp=sharing

Here is the music I'd like to use, I believe it can be saved from tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@prestonmonoc/video/7284973977632656682

I've attached a very laughable version of a recorded powerpoint to show what was in my head.

I've also attached a moodboard to show the colors of my new brand.

The timing of my animations at the end is a little off, however the ending can follow the beat of the music in a way that makes sense.

Budget: $300
Posted On: July 01, 2024 03:57 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design
Skills: Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 📷 Need work? Cash Cow Videos? Total Cost Per Video? - Upwork
item.description:
To Apply: Quote me how much you will charge me PER VIDEO, for everything.  

You can leverage as many AI tools as you need to like: Pictory, Eleven Labs, Gamma AI, whatever you need to use.

Looking for someone that can make videos for my youtube channel here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOB-5jnfDH24_pHVawul57g

looking for someone that will give me a total cost PER video.

That means everything, scriptwriting, thumbnail etc...
and a humanized voice over using eleven labs or a similar tool that passes the youtube monetization standards.

Please tell me how much you will charge me for each 10 minute video. TOTAL.  Total price.

I will not consider anything else except for a clear total price.

I'm really looking for someone that's hungry to get experience and knows they can do that, and will be happy with getting paid PER VIDEO and doing it all.

I'm not trying to waste anyone's time, so please do not reply if you do not give me a total per video based on the youtube channel I am showing you.

Thank you very much.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$15.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 03:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: United States

item.title: Product review video creators (Amazon) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there!
I'm YouXing Qing from a social media agency in China. We are a social media agency in China helping clients to build a visual image that has the best conversion rates. We are looking for someone who can film buyer videos for our clients to post on Amazon.  No matter you are a student, a housewife, or anyone who has some spare time, as long as you want to earn some commissions, you can do this job.

What you can get from this job:
1.Commission --- $10 for 1 video.
2.Free and diverse products --- The products will be sent directly to your address without returning back after you filmed the video. That is to say, you can get free products like beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.
3.Free time schedule --- You can still go to school \ go to work \ be at home babysitting \ taking care of your family, and get the video done in your spare time.
4.Future career--- Do you want to be an influencer? Do you want to do related jobs in the future? If yes, this might be the cornerstone of your future career development.

The video should be done in these ways:
1.The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for introduction (selling points & functions), and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product.
2.Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video.
3.A clean, bright shooting environment.
4.Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English.
5.DO NOT mention price or discount in video.
6.DO NOT show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and DO NOT reveal any personal information.
7.DO NOT have the watermark.

If you decide to do this job, you need to know:
1.Punctuality --- you need to film the video in 3 DAYs after you got the product.
2.Follow the standards --- you need to film the video with our requirements. After your shooting, name the video in this format: ORDER NUMBER + PRODUCT NAME + YOUR NAME, and upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me. The commission will be paid one week after the video passing our audit.
3.If you are UNABLE to complete the shooting ON TIME after you receive the product, you need to PAY for the product or FORWARD the product to the designated address and BEAR the shipping cost.
4.If you want a long leave or quiting the job, you need to inform us 15 DAYs in advance.
5.About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

If you have any interest or concerns, feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently. Looking forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!.


Budget: $10
Posted On: July 01, 2024 03:25 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:English, Video Production
Skills: English, Video Production
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Looking For A High Quality Video Editor For Facebook/Instagram Ads - Upwork
item.description:
Please check out some of the reference ads to get an idea of what we are looking for: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1L6hOM-oInRCXjc5nz1UJmIkEPUgPDpFl?usp=sharing

We are looking for an editor who can have quick turnaround with high quality edits.

Most ads will be less than a minute and we will need them done 48 hours after you recieve the files.

There will be a couple ads that need edited per week.

This is a longterm position. We have been running ads for more than a decade and need a longterm editor onboard.

Please send me a reference of your work in your submission.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$8.00

item.title: Fortnite Gamer needed for TikTok Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Fortnite gamer to create daily content for our rapidly growing TikTok channel, which is nearing 1 million followers. If you have a passion for Fortnite and experience in content creation, we would love to hear from you!

Requirements:

Extensive experience playing Fortnite.
Ability to create engaging and high-quality TikTok videos, each 60 seconds or longer.
Creativity in developing content that resonates with the Fortnite community.
Familiarity with current trends and viral content within the Fortnite and TikTok spaces.
Strong video editing skills to ensure professional and polished videos.
Consistency in producing daily content.
Responsibilities:

Create daily 60-second or longer TikTok videos focused on Fortnite gameplay, tips, tricks, challenges, and other engaging content.
Develop videos similar to the style and quality of this example: Example Video.
Stay up-to-date with Fortnite updates, trends, and community preferences to ensure relevant and engaging content.
Collaborate with our team to align content with our channel's growth strategy and audience preferences.
Monitor video performance and adapt content strategies based on feedback and analytics.
If you have existing Fortnite content, please share it with us as part of your application. We are excited to find a dedicated gamer who can help us continue to grow and engage our audience with amazing Fortnite content.

Apply now and be part of our exciting journey to 1 million followers!

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 01, 2024 03:19 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Gaming, Fortnite
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Gaming, Fortnite
Country: United States
click to apply
